abstract: BEA Systems defended itself Monday in the face of mounting pressure to strike a deal to sell the company after it allowed Oracle‘s buyout offer to expire Sunday night.
lead_paragraph: BEA Systems defended itself Monday in the face of mounting pressure to strike a deal to sell the company after it allowed Oracle‘s buyout offer to expire Sunday night.

headline.main: BEA Defends Its Rebuff of the Takeover Attempt by Oracle
